title: Augusta County: Samuel Franklin Carson to Unknown (probably Annie Harris), September 30, 1863
summary: Carson writes to someone, almost certainly Annie Harris, about his army's recent preparations to defend against a Yankee force. He expresses some doubt about whether he will survive this encounter which will take place somewhere along the "Rapidan river" near "Orange C.H."
keywords: Camp Life, Church/Religious Activity, Military Strategy, American Civil War
